mapper.insert: insert into board (bo_idx, bo_me_email, bo_bbsid, bo_me_nick, bo_title, bo_content, bo_regip, bo_regdate) values(BO_IDX_SEQ.nextval, #{bo_me_email}, #{bo_bbsid}, #{bo_me_nick}, #{bo_title}, #{bo_content}, #{bo_regip}, sysdate)
mapper.select: update board set bo_status = "1", bo_deldate = sysdate where bo_idx = #{bo_idx}
mapper.update: update board set bo_idx = #{bo_idx}, bo_me_email = #{bo_me_email}, bo_bbsid = #{bo_bbsid}, bo_me_nick = #{bo_me_nick}, bo_title = #{bo_title}, bo_content = #{bo_content}, bo_regdate = #{bo_regdate} bo_regip = #{bo_regip}, where bo_idx = #{bo_idx}
